description_full: Increases Rage Generation of  Shield Slam by 2, which is also multiplied by  Violent Outburst. But more importantly, it increases  Shield Block duration by 1 second every time you press  Shield Slam, resulting in pretty much infinite  Shield Block uptime. Mandatory pick for low haste levels early in an expansion.
